original_title: World Series of Fighting 22: Palhares vs. Shields
overview: World Series of Fighting 22: Palhares vs. Shields was a mixed martial arts event held August 1, 2015 in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States. This event aired on NBCSN in the U.S and on Fight Network in Canada.
title: World Series of Fighting 22: Palhares vs. Shields
